amendatorysection.catchline: Violation of Central Interstate Low-Level Radioactive Waste Compact; Attorney General; duties.
amendatorysection.para: Any action for a violation of the Central Interstate Low-Level Radioactive Waste Compact or an action to enjoin a violation or to compel performance under the compact shall be brought by the Attorney General in the name of the state.

crossreference.para: Central Interstate Low-Level Radioactive Waste Compact, see section 71-3522.
